edu.rutgers.cs.scarletTaxi.centralDataStoratge

Class CentralDataStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rutgers.cs.scarletTaxi.centralDataStoratge.CentralDataStorage

  • public abstract class CentralDataStorage
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class provides static methods to retrieve Objects of the User, Car, Ride, and Request classes. These objects provide access to the stored information of the Central Data Storage module. This class also provides static methods for updating and removing records from the database.
    Author:
    Isaac Yochelson

    • Method Detail

      • getUserID

        public static int getUserID(java.lang.String username,
            java.lang.String email)
        This method returns a userID for a user whose username and email are given. All userIDs will be non-negative. The caller must test for negative returns!
        Parameters:
        username -
        email -
        Returns:
        returns a userID if the username and email are associated with a user, and -1 if there is no matching user.

      • getUser

        public static User getUser(int userID)
        This method retrieves a user by userID.
        Parameters:
        userID -
        Returns:
        The User, if any, matching the userID. This must be tested for null!

      • getUser

        public static User getUser(java.lang.String userName,
           byte[] password)
        This method retrieves a user by userName and password hash. This can be used for user verification on incoming communications.
        Parameters:
        userName -
        password - this is a salted and hashed password stored as an array of bytes.
        Returns:
        The user, if any, matching the username and password. This must be tested for null!

      • getRequest

        public static Request getRequest(int requestID)
        Retrieves a Request based on the
        Parameters:
        requestID -
        Returns:
        The request, if any, matching the requestID. THis must be tested for null!

      • getRequests

        public static java.util.List<Request> getRequests(int userID)
        Retrieves a list of requests made by a specific user.
        Parameters:
        userID -
        Returns:
        A list of all requests made by the specified user. This list may be empty if either there is no such user or the user has made no requests.

      • getRide

        public static Ride getRide(int rideID)
        Retrieves information about a ride by its rideID.
        Parameters:
        rideID -
        Returns:
        A Ride object matching this rideID, if one exists, will be returned. THis must be checked for null!

      • getRides

        public static java.util.List<Ride> getRides(int userID)
        Retrieves information about all ride offers a specific user has made.
        Parameters:
        userID -
        Returns:
        A list of all ride offers, if any, made by the specified user. This list may be empty if either there is no such user or the user has made no ride offers.

      • getCars

        public static java.util.List<Car> getCars(int userID)
        Retrieves a list of all cars registered to a specific user.
        Parameters:
        userID -
        Returns:
        A list of all cars, if any, registered to the user in the database. This list can be empty if either there is no such user or the user has not registered any cars.

      • addUser

        public static boolean addUser(User newUser)
        Add a new user to the database
        Parameters:
        newUser -
        Returns:
        Returns true if the user was added successfully, and false otherwise.

      • removeUser

        public static boolean removeUser(int userID)
        Remove a user from the database by userID
        Parameters:
        userID -
        Returns:
        returns true if the user was found and successfully removed, and false otherwise.

      • modifyUser

        public static boolean modifyUser(int userID,
                 User newData)
        modify a user's profile information in the database
        Parameters:
        userID - The user to be modified
        newData - New data that will replace the current user data. This will be a full replacement, so it is important that any unmodified information be included in the newData object.
        Returns:
        returns true if the user was found and successfully modified, and false otherwise.

      • addCar

        public static boolean addCar(Car newCar)
        add a car to the database.
        Parameters:
        newCar - the data to be added. It is important that the proper User object be in the driver field of newCar.
        Returns:
        returns true if the new car was added successfully, and false otherwise.

      • removeNextRide

        public static boolean removeNextRide(int userID)
        removes the ride from the database whose driver matches the userID field and whose time is the closest to the current time in the future.
        Parameters:
        userID -
        Returns:
        returns true if a future ride for the user was found and removed successfully, and false otherwise.
